title: Korean Accounts
body:
To all the people who say they have a Korean account, shut up.

To get a Korean account you must have certain things.

I just get really triggered when people say they have one.

Thanks for reading my rant(?).

replies.body:
B-but I do have a Korean account, I just don't use it much due to the ping issue, lol.


http://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=SephirothSG

haha i could get one, i have everything i need. But it takes so damn long to do all the set up steps then install the actually Korean client and play on it.

If you want though, i could get 1, just for you.
